summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) automated notification email indicating that a user at the CBP-Buffalo, Peace Bridge location accessed a lookout query record for Jeffrey Epstein on June 29, 2021. It shows continued law enforcement interest in Epstein's records years after his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a CBP Person Lookout Query Record hit notification for Jeffrey Epstein, indicating his record was accessed by a user at the Peace Bridge border crossing.

events.title: CBP Lookup of Epstein Record
events.description: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection user at the Peace Bridge border crossing in Buffalo accessed a Person Lookout Query record for Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) query for Jeffrey Epstein's lookout record was accessed on June 29, 2021.
The access occurred at the CBP-Buffalo, Peace Bridge location, a U.S.-Canada border crossing.
The document shows law enforcement systems continued to contain and flag Epstein's records years after his 2019 death.
The query was performed by a user identified as 'TASPD' (likely a CBP unit or system code).
The record identifier was P3N06596100A01, which appears to be a TECS (Treasury Enforcement Communications System) ID.
